featured.text: He experimented with different ways and settled on being a naturalist.
The naturalist in Cartier-Bresson believed that all editing should be done when the photo is taken.

definition.zh_def: 自然主義者；研究自然界的人，特別是動植物。
definition.en_def: A person who studies or is an expert in natural history, especially a biologist or ecologist.
definition.example: The naturalist spent years observing the behavior of birds in their natural habitat.
